name: US Expert Bottle Shooter 3D
description:
US Expert Bottle Shooter 3D is bottle shooting games with gun. The bottle game is a new bottle crush bottle shooting. With classical bottle shooting expert 3d lets you bottle break, bottle toss, bottle smash. Enjoy and have fun in break the glass bottle shooter, most addictive game of bottle shooting games.
Features:
1. Bottle shooting game
2. 3D graphics and smooth animation
3. Realistic sound of broken bottles
4. Multiple challenging levels
5. Interactive UI
6. Sniper gun for professional shooting experience
